p: Methods: All blood cultures results taken in the Detroit Medical Center ICUs from December 2012 to March 2013 were collected. Any patient who had a negative BC was reviewed. All cultures taken within 10 days of the negative BCs were further reviewed. Patients were then divided into 3 groups: 1.BC positive group- BCs within 10 days of the negative BC were positive. 2. Non BC positive group - other cultures within 10 days of the negative BC were positive. 3. All culture negative. The 3 groups were compared.
